title: Ven. Bowatte Indraratana Thero – A Farewell Tribute
content: – by Senaka Weeraratna – No greater crime in the history of humankind can match the unrelenting and unceasing war that members of the human species are waging almost every moment of the day against members of other species for their flesh and bones. This is the biggest war of human kind being waged from…
